main event: A pilot observed multiple flying objects over Bakersfield, California on June 24, 1947.
interesting points: The pilot initially saw ten objects flying in a V formation, then later saw seven in a similar formation. The objects were thought to be government test planes. The pilot speculated they resembled the XF5U-1 flying flapjack design. The objects were reported to be traveling at high speeds, estimated between 300 to 500 mph. The sighting occurred during clear and sunny weather conditions.
sighted object: flying objects in a V formation
witness description: A pilot with considerable flight experience, including military and civilian aircraft.
